snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''Do Appeals Courts Flout Justice?'' (letters, March 18): The summary methods of deciding appeals are not unique to Federal appellate courts....
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Do Appeals Courts Flout Justice?'' (letters, March 18): The summary methods of deciding appeals are not unique to Federal appellate courts.
abstract: Laurance S Smith letter says appeals courts in California and other large states resort to same summary methods of handling cases that Federal courts are criticized for (letters, March 18)

headline.main: Finding Little Justice in Appeals Courts
